block.box: The limitations set forth in Section 17.2(b) shall not apply with
respect to: (i) undisputed payment obligations for Services performed; (ii) breach
of confidentiality (other than as provided in Section 17.2(d)); (iii) gross negligence;
(iv) willful misconduct; (v) intentional refusal to perform or repudiation of any
Services in violation of this Master Services Agreement; and, (vi) indemnification
